Package de.oth.blocklib.entities.billboards

Class TextBillboard

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.entities.billboards.Billboard
de.oth.blocklib.entities.billboards.TextBillboard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable, java.io.Serializable
public class TextBillboard
extends Billboard
Creates a billboard with text. The text is created and stored as a texture. Code was taken from the TextItem class of the UI by Tobias Werner.
Author:
Sven Kalle SoSe2018
See Also:
UIText, Serialized Form
